segments.text: I notice the kitchen is filled with the kind of ordinary detail that somehow feels comforting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, there’s a sinister undertone with that overflow running wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so focused on that plate, completely unaware of the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a wave of disbelief as I watch the boy inch closer to disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why is he taking such a risk just for cookies?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar itself tempts him, a beacon of sweetness in this chaotic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s funny, in a way, that such innocent behavior comes with such peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, her palm raised like a kid in class waiting to answer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already envision the moment when one of them will slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The view through the window reminds me of how calm everything outside is, contrasting with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
